string.value: #b#p1002100##k, who lives in Lith Harbor, wants to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza.. I better help #b#p1002100##k make her way to the party.

To earn the permission from her dad, #b#p1002100##k decided to make a Mushroom Stew for him. 
 #eMushroom Stew: Ingredients#n 
#t04000011:# #b#c04000011#/5#k 
#t04000009:# #b#c04000009#/5#k 
#t04000012:# #b#c04000012#/20#k 
#t04000015:# #b#c04000015#/20 
 #r!Warning : Please do not lose #b#t1002508##k.
After helping #b#p1002100##k in her quest to go to the party, she strengthened my #b#t01002508##k as promised.

Hey, isn't that the #b#t01002508##k for the 3rd anniversary of MapleStory? I really wanted to go to the party myself, but my dad's not letting me go. He's very strict and protective of me. So much so that I've never traveled once in my life. Of course, he won't let me go to that party, either.
Can you pleeeeease help me go to the party? If you can, then I'll upgrade the #b#t01002508##k that you have right now. Don't worry, I studied this, and I know what I'm doing.
To make matters worse, my dad hasn't been in a good mood lately for some reason. I can't even bring up the party in front of him. He might Say yes, though, if I make him something delicious...

I knew you'd be more than willing to help me out! My dad loves this special Mushroom Stew that my mom used to make. If I make him a bowl of Mushroom Stew, then I'm sure he'll be happy with it, and he just might let me go to the party. Please get me #b5 #t4000011#s, 5 #t4000009#s, 20 #t4000012#s, and 20 #t4000015#s#k for the stew.
I really want to go to the party, too... please help me... *cries*

Did you bring all the ingredients? You did! This should be more than enough for me to make the stew... and he might be happy enough to let me go to the party. What should I wear for the party? Oh man, this is exciting! Oh yeah, as promised, I have just upgraded your #b#t01002508##k. Hope you like it!
The ingredients for the Mushroom Stew are #b5 #t4000011#s, 5 #t4000009#s, 20 #t4000012#s, and 20 #t4000015#s#k.
